alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Irion; Schleicher; Sutton; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 14 at 3:25AM CDT until March 14 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR TOM GREEN, IRION, CROCKETT, SCHLEICHER AND SUTTON COUNTIES. The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a Red Flag Warning for critical fire weather conditions, which is in effect from Noon today to 10 PM CDT this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * WINDS...Southwest to west 15 to 25 mph, shifting to the northwest in the late afternoon and evening. Wind gusts 30 to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...dropping to between 10 and 20 percent in the afternoon. * FUELS...Dry to Critically Dry. * IMPACTS...ANY FIRES THAT DEVELOP CAN SPREAD RAPIDLY. OUTDOOR BURNING IS DISCOURAGED.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now or will occur shortly. A combination of strong winds, low humidity and dry fuels will contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Crockett; Irion; Schleicher; Sutton; Tom Green
